---
title: NonApiType
summary: Certain types should not be passed across public API boundaries.
layout: bugpattern
tags: ''
severity: WARNING
---

## Suppression
Suppress false positives by adding the suppression annotation `@SuppressWarnings("NonApiType")` to the enclosing element.
